devdoc.author: Masa Finance
devdoc.details: From this smart contract we can mint new Soulbound Identities and Soul Name NFTs. This minting can be done paying a fee in ETH, USDC or CORN

constructor.details: Creates a new Soul Factory, that has the role to minting new Soulbound Identities and Soul Name NFTs, paying a fee

params._defaultStableCoin: Default stable coin to pay the fee in (USDC)
params._mintingPrice: Price of the minting in stable coin
params._reserveWallet: Wallet that will receive the fee
params._soulBoundIdentity: Address of the Soulbound identity contract
params._utilityToken: Utility token to pay the fee in ($CORN)

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

pause().details: Sets an emergency stop mechanism that can be triggered by an authorized account.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

purchase(address,string).details: This function allows the purchase of a soulbount identity usign stable coin (USDC), native token (ETH) or utility token ($CORN)

params.name: Name of the new soul name
params.paymentMethod: Address of token that user want to pay

returns._0: TokenId of the new soulbound identity

purchaseInfo().details: Returns all current pricing and amount informations for a purchase

returns.priceInETH: Current price of the minting in native token (ETH)
returns.priceInStableCoin: Current price of the minting in stable coin
returns.priceInUtilityToken: Current price of the minting in utility token ($CORN)

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setDefaultStableCoin(address).details: The caller must have the admin role to call this function

params._defaultStableCoin: New default stable coin to pay the fee in

setMintingPrice(uint256).details: The caller must have the admin role to call this function

params._mintingPrice: New price of the minting in stable coin

setReserveWallet(address).details: Let change the reserve walled. It can be triggered by an authorized account.

setSoulboundIdentity(address).details: The caller must have the admin role to call this function

setUtilityToken(address).details: The caller must have the admin role to call this function

params._utilityToken: New utility token to pay the fee in

unpause().details: Unsets an emergency stop mechanism. It can be triggered by an authorized account.

devdoc.title: Soul Factory

pause().notice: Pauses the operations in the smart contract

purchase(address,string).notice: Mints a new Soulbound Identity purchasing it

purchaseInfo().notice: Returns the price of the minting

setDefaultStableCoin(address).notice: Sets the default stable coin to pay the fee in (USDC)

setMintingPrice(uint256).notice: Sets the price of the minting in stable coin

setSoulboundIdentity(address).notice: Sets the SoulboundIdentity contract address linked to this factory

setUtilityToken(address).notice: Sets the utility token to pay the fee in ($CORN)

unpause().notice: Unpauses the operations in the smart contract

userdoc.notice: Soul Factory, that can mint new Soulbound Identities and Soul Name NFTs, paying a fee
